direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve removing elements from the set, but 'removeAll' removes multiple elements based on a collection.
Both methods modify the set based on the elements of a provided collection, but 'retainAll' keeps the elements that are in the collection instead of removing them.
Both methods involve conditional removal of elements, but 'removeIf' uses a predicate to determine which elements to remove.
Both methods remove elements from the set, but 'clear' removes all elements, while 'removeAll' removes elements based on a collection.
Both methods remove elements from the set, but 'remove(int)' removes an element at a specific index.
